CONSOLE MESSAGE: line 9: iframe loaded
Tests that proper (and different) styles are returned for body elements of main document and iframe.


Main frame style:
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded]

    background: blue;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;

element.style { ()

[expanded]

    background: green;

[expanded] 
body { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
    margin: 8px;
